response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with the highest quality materials and cutting-edge technology, making it a true masterpiece. It comes with a comprehensive set of features designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its unparalleled value and craftsmanship, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving compared to market rates. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your life or business.", "product_price": 15000}
